statements: SELECT * FROM game_session_data WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT game_name, duration, score FROM game_session_data WHERE end_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT player_id, start_time, end_time FROM game_session_data ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT game_name FROM game_session_data;
SELECT MAX(score) AS highest_score, MIN(score) AS lowest_score FROM game_session_data;
SELECT session_id, player_id, game_name, start_time, end_time, duration, score, feedback FROM game_session_data WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT session_id, player_id, game_name, start_time, end_time, duration, score, feedback FROM game_session_data WHERE game_name = 'Chess' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT session_id, player_id, game_name, start_time, end_time, duration, score, feedback FROM game_session_data WHERE score > 100 AND feedback LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY duration ASC;
SELECT session_id, player_id, game_name, start_time, end_time, duration, score, feedback FROM game_session_data WHERE end_time > '2022-01-01' AND duration > '1 day';
SELECT session_id, player_id, game_name, start_time, end_time, age(duration) AS duration_days, score, feedback FROM game_session_data WHERE duration > '3 hours' ORDER BY duration_days DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_sessions;
SELECT session_id, player_id, start_time, end_time FROM game_sessions ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT session_id, player_id, game_id, start_time, end_time FROM game_sessions WHERE player_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT session_id, player_id, game_id, start_time, end_time FROM game_sessions WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT feedback_id, session_id, player_id, rating, comment FROM feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_sessions WHERE session_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT player_id, start_time FROM game_sessions ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT COUNT(session_id) FROM game_sessions WHERE player_id = 'a6b8d72b-8581-4e9b-94c0-9de771ffc3db';
SELECT player_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM feedback GROUP BY player_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 3;
SELECT session_id, player_id, end_time - start_time AS session_duration FROM game_sessions WHERE game_id = '0d4c7bbe-3052-4d5b-a128-40c8f1a19428' ORDER BY session_duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_sessions;
SELECT session_id, start_time, end_time FROM game_sessions WHERE player_id = '1234';
SELECT player_id, COUNT(session_id) AS session_count FROM game_sessions GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, session_id, score FROM player_scores ORDER BY score DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM player_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%';
SELECT * FROM game_sessions WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT player_id, SUM(score) FROM player_scores GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY SUM(score) DESC;
SELECT player_id, session_id, feedback_text FROM player_feedback WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT session_id, player_id, start_time, end_time FROM game_sessions WHERE end_time IS NOT NULL;
SELECT session_id, player_id, start_time, end_time FROM game_sessions WHERE session_id IN (SELECT session_id FROM player_scores WHERE score > 100);
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players;
SELECT game_name, release_date FROM games WHERE game_category = 'Action';
SELECT session_id, player_id, game_id, session_date FROM game_sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_rating FROM feedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT game_id, game_name, release_date FROM games WHERE game_category = 'Puzzle' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, game_name, duration_minutes FROM players p JOIN game_sessions gs ON p.player_id = gs.player_id JOIN games g ON gs.game_id = g.game_id;
SELECT player_name, feedback_text, feedback_rating FROM players p JOIN game_sessions gs ON p.player_id = gs.player_id JOIN feedback f ON gs.session_id = f.session_id WHERE feedback_rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_id, player_name, registration_date FROM players ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, email_address FROM players WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT session_id, start_time, end_time FROM game_sessions WHERE end_time IS NOT NULL;
SELECT player_name, level_completed FROM players JOIN player_progress ON players.player_id = player_progress.player_id WHERE level_completed > 5;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, email_address FROM players WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT player_name, score FROM players JOIN game_sessions ON players.player_id = game_sessions.player_id JOIN game_scores ON game_sessions.session_id = game_scores.session_id WHERE game_scores.score > 100;
SELECT player_name, feedback_text, rating FROM players JOIN game_feedback ON players.player_id = game_feedback.player_id WHERE rating BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT player_name, level_completed, last_login FROM players JOIN player_progress ON players.player_id = player_progress.player_id WHERE last_login < '2022-01-01';
